name: Websters Chalk Paint Powder
description:
Websters Chalk Paint Powder™  4 oz.
Each bag of Websters is enough for 4 cups (or 1 qt.) of paint!  So now you CAN afford to chalk paint! Simply mix 2 TBS Websters Chalk Paint Powder into any quality latex paint!

name: Fiddes & Sons Wax Supreme
description:
Fiddes & Sons Supreme Wax Polish for finishing chalk paint!

When painting with chalk paint, many people prefer a hand-rubbed wax finish. We, at Websters Chalk Paint Powder™, have tried so many that are on the market. We found one we LOVE and know you will, too! Fiddes & Sons wax has been in business in England for generations! Our supplier in the US keeps us stocked so we never run out! We are offering it here because it finishes with chalk paint so beautifully! We have four favorite colors, Clear (no color at all) Light (almost clear), Rugger Brown (antique) and Jacobean(almost black). You can achieve a time worn distressed look using Fiddes wax. Please specify Clear, Light ,Rugger Brown or Jacobean at checkout. 
* We now have the Clear in stock! Perfect for white furniture!

**The Light will appear clear on every color except the whitest white. When used on snow white pieces, a slight yellow tint will appear. Please test a paint stirrer with your paint on it and a coat of wax.**

***Wax may melt during shipping in the warm/hot months. It will reharden without any problems. Might look a little funny but will work just fine :)

name: Extra Large Waxing Brush
description:
*Shanghai boar bristles 
*Nickel plated steel ferrule
*Comfortable 7" long wood handle
*Made in USA

This extra large waxing brush features a 2" across ferrule with fine Shanghai boar bristles. It is excellent for waxing large areas.

Fiddes wax is easily applied with a rag. But we know some of you love a brush! We actually find less wax waste using a brush. Makes blending light and dark wax a breeze!

* A small amount of bristle shedding is expected.

name: Large Waxing Brush
description:
*Shanghai boar bristles
*Nickle plated steel ferrule
*Comfortable 7" long wood handle
*Made in USA

This large waxing brush features a 1 1/2" across ferrule with fine 2" Shanghai boar bristles. It is excellent for waxing large areas.

Fiddes wax is easily applied with a rag. But we know some of you love a brush! We actually find less wax waste using a brush. Makes blending light and dark wax a breeze!

* A small amount of bristle shedding is expected.

name: Medium Size Waxing Brush
description:
*Shanghai boar bristles
*Nickle plated steel ferrule
*Comfortable 5 1/2" long wood handle
*Made in USA

This medium size waxing brush features a 1" across ferrule with fine 1 1/2" Shanghai boar bristles. It is excellent for waxing smaller areas.

Fiddes wax is easily applied with a rag. But we know some of you love a brush! We actually find less wax waste using a brush. Makes blending light and dark wax a breeze!

* A small amount of bristle shedding is expected.

name: Small Size Waxing Brush
description:
*Shanghai boar bristles
*Nickle plated steel ferrule
*Comfortable 3 1/2" short wood handle
*Made in USA

This small waxing brush features a 3/4" across ferrule with fine 1 1/4" Shanghai boar bristles. It is excellent for waxing small or hard to reach areas. Also great for stenciling.

Fiddes wax is easily applied with a rag. But we know some of you love a brush! We actually find less wax waste using a brush. Makes blending light and dark wax a breeze!

* A small amount of bristle shedding is expected.

name: Round Drill Brush
description:
We don't want you to work too hard! So we are offering a drill brush! This brush has extremely hard-wearing bristles and can be used in a drill to buff wax to a hard, high gloss finish. Can be used on all electric drills. Great for spindles!

Apply wax with a rag or wax brush. Wax should be dry enough to polish in just a few minutes. Use this round drill brush to buff and polish your furniture to a shine!

*Apply a small amount of wax with a rag or wax brush (about a quarter size dollop to cover a 2-3 sq. foot area). Use the buffing brush to polish and bring up the shine. If necessary, tilt the brush to 45 degrees and use the sides of the bristles. If you use too much wax, the brush may leave visible brush marks. The trick is "little wax"....and side of brush if necessary.

* A small amount of bristle shedding is expected.

name: Bulk Order for BIG Projects
description: 2 lb bag of Websters Chalk Paint Powder. We answered the need for people who paint a LOT of furniture. Two pounds (same amount as 8 of our regular bags).  This is enough to create 2 GALLONS of chalk paint. Add to a gallon and paint a room or two or three! Or add to 8 quarts OR add to 32 cups!  The possibilities are endless! Not packaged & labeled for individual resale.

name: Embroidered Websters Apron
description: This is a "one size" natural colored apron. Cotton/Poly blended with three pocket front. Embroidered Websters Chalk Paint Powder in black. Custom name embroidered in choice of colors for an additional $5. Save your clothes and promote your paint!
